####Package Management

```{r packages, warning=FALSE}

library(ISLR)
library(MASS)


```

#### Load data 

```{r Load Boston Data}
names(Boston)
head(Boston)
summary(Boston) 
```

#### Regression Modeling

```{r Regression Modeling}
plot(medv~lstat,Boston)

model1<-lm(medv~lstat,data = Boston)
summary(model1)
confint(model1)
predict(model1,data.frame(lstat=c(5,10,15)))
```



```{r Regression Plots}
plot(model1)  
```
